article_title: Will West Coast Longshore Labor Talks Wrap Up Early? Don't Count On It

article_metadata.description: CORRECTION: A reference to the ILWU's Pay Guarantee Plan in an earlier version of this story has been deleted. The provisions of the PGP do not apply after expiration of the current contract. A coalition of 67 groups representing manufacturers, farmers, retailers and transportation providers urged the International Longshore and Warehouse Union [...]
article_metadata.author: Robert Bowman
